attributes.action: Grant all South African whites the right to immediate asylum in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
"There was overwhelming support at the Conference that the ANC must pursue the expropriation of land without compensation." (1) 

"Since 1990, a total of 1,081 white commercial farmers have been murdered in South Africa" (2)

"White communities face a level of deprivation, or of violence, which threatens their future in the country...you will not read about it in newspapers or see it reported on television" (3)

(1) http://archive.is/o5dTs
(2) http://archive.is/R5LCC
(3) http://archive.is/AyqE0
attributes.background: The white minority in South Africa have become a despised and endangered group of people since the ANC began to use them as a scapegoat to appease its supporters.  I petition the UK government to immediately grant all South African whites refugee status and aid their resettlement in the UK.

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
